DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Acupuncture moxibustion may improve well-being quality life patient lymphedema cause breast cancer head , neck , throat cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well acupuncture give together moxibustion work improve well-being quality life patient breast cancer head , neck , throat cancer undergo standard treatment lymphedema .
DOC.brief_title: Using Traditional Acupuncture Management Cancer Treatment Related Lymphoedema
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To test acupuncture moxibustion treatment strategy obtain first measure response approach ( e ) use patient breast cancer head , neck , throat cancer undergo standard treatment secondary lymphedema . - To assess whether treatment acceptable intervention cancer patient secondary lymphedema health care professional . - To disseminate data begin build evidence base use treatment management lymphedema . OUTLINE : Patients undergo acupuncture moxibustion therapy weekly 7 treatment ( Series 1 ) . After completion therapy , patient may choose continue treatment additional 6 treatment ( Series 2 ) . Patients complete set 4 questionnaire ( i.e. , sociodemographic , Short-Form-36 , Positive Negative Affect Scale ( PANAS ) , Measure Yourself Medical Outcome Profile ( MYMOP ) ) first treatment periodically study . Patients also complete series follow-up questionnaire design elicit feedback acupuncture experience . After completion study treatment , patient follow 1 3 month .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : male female patient either breast head neck cancer diagnosis mild moderate uncomplicated lymphoedema age 18 care lymphoedema service lea : two month ( head neck cancer patient ) three month ( breast cancer patient ) active cancer disease least 3 month since prior active cancer treatment ( surgery , radiotherapy , chemotherapy , intravenous treatment ) 6 month since prior acupuncture treatment concurrent adjuvant hormonal therapy allow concurrent antidepressant medication allow provided change prescription dose within past 3 month patient intend remain medication duration study treatment followup Able understand communicate English Able travel Lynda Jackson Macmillan Centre treatment Able attend treatment weekly least 7 consecutive week Able complete outcome measure EXCLUSION CRITERIA : bilateral breast cancer advance cancer disease
